roleset.name: emit banging noise
roleset.note: BANG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bang' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 18.1, 43.2, 18.4, and 9.3; Framenet entry Motion noise. (from bang.01-v predicate notes)
BANGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on bang-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls sound_emission-43.2. (from banging.01-n)

example.name: bang!
example.text: The window shutters banged in the wind.

example.name: the one arg, plus LOC
example.text: The door's banging in the wind kept John up all night.

roleset.name: strike so as to make banging noise
roleset.note: BANG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bang' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 18.1, 43.2, 18.4, and 9.3; Framenet entry Motion noise. (from bang.02-v predicate notes)
BANGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on bang-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls bump-18.4-1, hit-18.1. (from banging.02-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: He bangs on the piece of paper in frustration, then turns and walks away.

example.name: He's back!
example.text: John banged open the lid of his coffin.

example.name: all args
example.text: The confrontation between supriya and him, his anger, his banging the door shut and what followed next, was all so fresh in her memory.

roleset.name: have sexual relations
roleset.note: BANGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from banging.03-n)

example.name: TMP
example.text: I get the impression she likes you and is maybe looking for something a little bit serious than occasional banging ..

roleset.name: talk about ceaselessly
roleset.note: BANG_ON-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from bang.03-v)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Most of the past riots have been majorly white , nobody-1 starts *-1 banging on about race then and they should n't .
